concept.title: Managing Personal Information in MyPack Portal
concept.shortdesc: NC State's MyPack Portal allows students to view and update their personal information securely.

conbody.p: The MyPack Portal is a central hub for managing your personal, academic, and financial information at NC State University. Through the Personal Information tile, you can access and update various aspects of your student profile:

ul.li: Personal Details (Student ID number, Name, and Preferred Name)
OIS Compliance Verification (for International students only)

conbody.p: Keeping this information up-to-date is crucial for maintaining accurate university records and ensuring effective communication between the institution and students.
